noPosition.message: It is not possible to find current position. If you do not want enable detection of the position, choose the point of search by clicking on Choose Position and touching a point on the map, otherwise it will not possible to perform researches.
noPosition.title: Position Not Found

chooseThreeSearchCenter.message: Select the center of the search area of services or the location where you want to know the weather.
chooseThreeSearchCenter.title: Search
